name: biological-machines-planet-balack
title: Biological Machines: Planet Balack
author: bradythehuman
description: Adds Balack, a post aquilo planet containing new scrap, oil sludge and strong enemies. A single bio fabricator can be placed at spawn and is required to produce new intermediates and products including a new module at the cost of massive pollution. The intermediates can be used to produce tank mk2, mech armor mk2 and warp drive.
